subSections.title: Hanja
subSections.text:
{{ko-hanja|hangeul=음}}

# ([[소리]] 음, ''sori-''): [[sound]]
# ([[소식]] 음, ''sosig-''): [[news]]
# ([[말]] 음, ''mal-''): [[speech]]
# ([[음]] 음, ''[[eum]]-''): [[pronunciation]]
#* [[訓]]之對 [[文字]]讀聲 ([[훈]]지대 [[문자]]독성, ''hunjidae munjadokseong'') the complement of the ''[[hun]]'' (hence) the sound reading a (Chinese) character.

subSections.title: Compounds
